wiki.content: "Me Against the Music" is a song performed by Britney Spears featuring Madonna. The song was written by Spears and Madonna along with Chris "Tricky" Stewart, Penelope Magnet, Thabiso Nikhereanye, Terius Nash, and Gary O'Brien for Spears' fourth studio album In the Zone (2003). "Me Against the Music" was a huge international success, reaching the top three in nearly every country in which it charted; it reached number one on the United World Chart for four weeks. The single sold 5.360.000 copies worldwide. It managed to get 2.608.000 of those points in 2003 alone, making it the 27th best-selling single of that year. It went to #1 on the U.S. Hot Dance Club Play chart in the Winter of 2003. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Me Against the Music" is a song performed by Britney Spears featuring Madonna. The song was written by Spears and Madonna along with Chris "Tricky" Stewart, Penelope Magnet, Thabiso Nikhereanye, Terius Nash, and Gary O'Brien for Spears' fourth studio album In the Zone (2003). "Me Against the Music" was a huge international success, reaching the top three in nearly every country in which it charted; it reached number one on the United World Chart for four weeks. The single sold 5.360.000 copies worldwide.

track.name: Me Against the Music
comments: I have warmed up to Britney somewhat, but this song still blows. She and Madonna sound like squeakier versions of Selma and Patty Bouvier.

Some people rate this as her weakest first single, but I completely disagree. People expected a lot more coming from a Madonna collab, but I think this song is just way too good. Everything! The video, amazing, the song, amazing, the performances, amazing! It's simple and it's like that. It may have been a commercial disaster(wut? but ok) but I love it!.
Princess and queen of pop making HISTORY. <3
Telephone is flop, MATM is masterpiece
Also how can anyone compare this to Telephone :O Telephone is in a whole new league!
Madonna ruins the whole song :'( could have been even better
If you like questioning the valid taste of others, then I feel sorry for you and your existence. [6]
Britney Army  & Maddy Lovers join please! http://www.lastfm.es/group/%E2%99%A7++The+Pop+Royalty+%E2%99%A7
